spells.name: Blistering Invective
spells.description: Make an Intimidate check against all foes within 30 feet; those demoralized also take fire damage.

spells.name: Discovery Torch
spells.description: Touched object emanates bright light, granting Perception and Sense Motive bonuses.

spells.name: Pilfering Hand
spells.description: You may seize an object or manipulate it from afar.

spells.name: Qualm
spells.description: Target gains penalties on ability checks, skill checks, and concentration checks until it spends an entire round doing nothing.

spells.name: Returning Weapon
spells.description: Grants a weapon the returning special weapon quality.

spells.name: Share Language, Communal
spells.description: As share language, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Tactical Acumen
spells.description: You gain an additional +1 on attack rolls or to AC due to battlefield positioning.

spells.name: Thunder Fire
spells.description: Ammunition in the targeted firearm deafens opponents.
